name: Nguyễn Hữu Dũng
description: I think I have gained a lot of experience from my work with foreigners, especially to understand how to create the UI / UX and how to make the software adapt to high-quality products.

name: Trần Hữu Quang
description: It's difficult to recall the happiest moment in my life because I have so many happy moments. But I think the moment is when I'm with my family when we play, laugh, smile and relax…

name: Võ Doãn Đồng
description: I was always looking for a dynamic and professional environment. Finally, I found these in Asian Tech. “Challenge something new everyday”, “You may not succeed, but you have to try to find out”.

name: Đoàn Ngọc Phước
description: That I'm an easy-going persion that works well with everyone, that I'm friendly and active. I am good at understanding difficulties and overcoming them together with my colleagues.
